simpleblogpage-editor-blog-select-new: Warning message when selected blog doesnt exist
simpleblogpage-editor-title-exists: Error message if selected blog title already exists
simpleblogpage-create-entry: Button label for creating new posts
simpleblogpage-error-invalid-content: Error message if content is not a blog post
simpleblogpage-error-invalid-target-page: Error message if target page is not a blog page
simpleblogpage-error-invalid-root-page: Error message if root page is not a blog page
simpleblogpage-create-root-summary: Edit summary message for creating a new blog page
simpleblogpage-edit-summary: Edit summary message for editing a blog page
simpleblogpage-filter-root: Label for the blog page filter
simpleblogpage-readmore: Label for the read more link
simpleblogpage-entry-blog-root-link:
Label for the link leading to root blog page.
$1 - Blog page title
$2 - Blog page displaytext
